metadata.synopsis: One shot voicebark in the Lower City. One origin character remarks something while passing through an area, then three other origins may respond to that remark. The respondents are prioritized from top to bottom. If none of the respondents are available, this won't play.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to S_LOW_OneShotVB_Minsc_RoaringContest_Trigger_245dc85b-d05e-43a0-a1e5-30a72a26b4bc near the Counting House with the initiator + one the respondents in your party

4.speaker: Minsc
4.context: NodeContext: Wyll: An attempt at a battle roar, but rather funny.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: Beg pardon. But there is naught so bracing as a good battle-roar, do you not agree?
1.context: NodeContext: Wyll: An attempt at a battle roar, but rather funny.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Let me give it a try. RRaaaghRGRGGRGH!
3.context: NodeContext: Wyll: An attempt at a battle roar, but rather funny.

2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: Oho, Boo - a challenge! I cannot let this go unanswered. One... two...
2.context: NodeContext: You were braced to demonstrate a great battle-roar, but Boo got there first. You believe his was far TOO frightening.

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: *SQUEAK!* Ai, Boo, come now. See how our friend trembles? You have taken the jest too far.
